nodes.text: The First Sun Mobile Regiment was a mercenary group that worked with the Galactic Empire during the height of the Galactic Civil War.

The Regiment's specialty was Search, Locate and Annihilate operations. As such, they would be supported by infantry vehicles and would contract out to the Imperial Army whenever the latter had need of their talents. This relationship turned sour when Moff Nile Owen executed an entire company of the First Sun Regiment, after which the Regiment distanced itself from the Empire. General Maska Zural, the leader of the Regiment, would then hire the group out to the highest bidder.
